text:
Tomcat 3.3.a

Logs in tomcat do not get flushed, losing some important information.
creator: achim.thesmann@pixfind.com
achim.thesmann@pixfind.com
text:
Created attachment 1355
This patch includes a flush for logging and also sets the priority of the "Adding jars" message to DEBUG

creator: Larry.Isaacs@sas.com
